comment: Richardson (MIA) firms up as he sets the screen on Lee (CHA) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
[Observable in enhanced video] Richardson (MIA) moves his pivot foot.
Walker (CHA) makes incidental contact with Richardson (MIA) that does not affect his RSBQ.
Zeller (CHA) maintains legal guarding position as he defends Richardson's (MIA) drive into the paint and makes incidental contact that does not affect his ability to complete the pass.
Whiteside (MIA) is in the paint for longer than three seconds.
Lee (CHA) makes incidental contact with Wade (MIA) that does not affect his ability to retrieve the rebound.
Deng (MIA) sets the screen on Lee (CHA) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
[Observable in enhanced video] Deng (MIA) moves his pivot foot. The official is looking for any illegal contact and does not pick up the pivot foot.
LATR shows that Lee (CHA) cleanly strips the ball from Deng (MIA).
Wade (MIA) legally contests Lee's (CHA) transition layup attempt. Wade does not touch the ball and his contact with the backboard does not affect the ability for the ball to score.
Wade (MIA) makes incidental body contact with Lee (CHA) that does not affect his shot attempt.

After communicating with the Replay Center, there was no conclusive video evidence to overturn the call on the court that Lin (CHA) was not behind the three point line on his field goal at 2:14 of the 4th quarter. The ruling on the court stood as called.
Richardson (MIA) sets the screen on Lee (CHA) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Zeller (CHA) firms up as he sets the screen on Richardson (MIA) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
[Incidental or immaterial] Whiteside (MIA) sets the screen on Batum (CHA) without giving him room to avoid the contact.
Lee (CHA) maintains legal guarding position as he defends Wade's (MIA) drive. Wade initiates contact on the play and briefly loses control of the ball.
Lee (CHA) maintains legal guarding position and makes incidental contact with Wade (MIA) that does not affect his RSBQ.
Walker (CHA) cleanly blocks Dragic's (MIA) jump shot attempt.

Zeller (CHA) comes towards Wade (MIA) from across the restricted area, planting his foot and jumping vertically to defend Wade’s shot. Zeller absorbs contact when it occurs and, while his arms are not completely vertical, multiple angles confirm they do not make contact with Wade. Therefore, Zeller maintains a legal guarding position as he attempts to defend the shot.

Lee (CHA) makes contact with the ball during Wade’s (MIA) upward shooting motion, which makes his subsequent, minor arm contact with Wade incidental. Lee then makes contact with Wade’s arm again at about 00:04.9, however, Wade has already lost possession of the ball.
Dragic (MIA) commits a take foul on Walker (CHA).
Wade (MIA) makes contact with the ball while standing OOB.

After communicating with the Replay Center, there was conclusive video evidence that showed that the ball was last touched by Miami prior to going OOB. The ruling on the court was overturned and Charlotte was awarded possession. Clock reset to 00:02.3.
Deng (MIA) grabs Zeller (CHA) and affects his FOM during the inbound.
Hawes (CHA) inbounds the ball within 5 seconds.
Richardson (MIA) and Deng (MIA) make contact with one another and do not make illegal contact with Zeller (CHA) after he catches the inbound pass.
